text: but you know the toughest thing is to love somebody who has done something mean to you especially when that somebody has been yourself have you ever done anything mean to yourself well it's very important to look inside yourself and find that loving part of you that's the part that you must take good care of

and never be mean to because that's the part of you that allows you to love your neighbor and your neighbor is anyone you happen to be with at any time of your life respecting and loving your neighbor can give everybody a good feeling
